author: David Brunnstrom
title: Pompeo warns U.S. may never restore WHO funding
description: U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has said a fundamental reform of the World Health Organization is needed following its handling of the coronavirus pandemic and that the United States, WHO's biggest donor, may never restore funding to the U.N. body.
content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has said a fundamental reform of the World Health Organization is needed following its handling of the coronavirus pandemic and that the United States, WHO’s biggest donor, may never restore funding t… [+2403 chars]
